title: How to Activate Incognito Mode in Opera

steps.title: Open Opera browser on your computer.
steps.content: Open Opera browser on your computer. Make sure that you are using the latest version of Opera browser.

steps.title: Open the side menu.
steps.content: Open the side menu. Just click on the Menu from the top-left corner.

steps.title: Open Private Window.
steps.content: Open Private Window. Select New Private Window from the list. Alternatively, you can press Ctrl+Shift+N on Windows and ⌘+Shift+N on Mac.

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. Once you’ve closed all the private windows after your browsing session, your data, such as history, cache and cookies, will be erased automatically.
